ubc-thrifty-grocers.pitch: A grocery delivery platform built for UBC students. Fast backend, secure access control, and a clean React frontend.
ubc-thrifty-grocers.keyChallenge: Learned Go from scratch while shipping production features. Focused heavily on API security and proper access control patterns.

oil-gas-asset-integrity-dashboard.pitch: Interactive Power BI dashboard for monitoring asset health and maintenance schedules in oil & gas operations.
oil-gas-asset-integrity-dashboard.keyChallenge: Designed data models to handle complex hierarchical asset relationships while keeping queries performant.

nwhacks-2024-comfort-corner.pitch: A mental health support platform with an AI-powered chatbot, built in 24 hours at Western Canada's largest hackathon.
nwhacks-2024-comfort-corner.keyChallenge: Integrated OpenAI's API to create empathetic, context-aware responses. Placed top 10 out of 653 participants.

business-tracking-application.pitch: Desktop app for small businesses to track purchases and visualize revenue trends with an interactive GUI.
business-tracking-application.keyChallenge: Applied OOP design patterns and built comprehensive unit tests. First experience with full software development lifecycle.

heart-disease-prediction-model.pitch: ML model that predicts heart disease likelihood from patient records using K-Nearest Neighbors classification.
heart-disease-prediction-model.keyChallenge: Learned the importance of feature scaling and data cleaning. Achieved 83% accuracy through careful hyperparameter tuning.

calgaryhacks-2025-wildbc.pitch: Web app raising awareness about BC wildlife conservation through interactive maps, timelines, and community features.
calgaryhacks-2025-wildbc.keyChallenge: Built in 24 hours with a team. Handled the full-stack integration of maps, timelines, and a discussion board.

production-analytics-forecasting-dashboa.pitch: Time-series analytics dashboard for exploring operational data with built-in forecasting and backtesting tools.
production-analytics-forecasting-dashboa.keyChallenge: Implemented rolling-origin backtesting to validate forecasts. Achieved 45% lower error than baseline models.

everyday-cleaning-company.pitch: Started my own cleaning company and built the entire tech stack from scratch. Full-stack website with automated quote system, email notifications, and SEO â€” plus running the actual business.
everyday-cleaning-company.keyChallenge: Wore every hat: founder, developer, marketer, and cleaner. Built the site, configured transactional emails with Resend, handled client bookings, and grew the business from zero.

vhs-portfolio.pitch: The site you're looking at right now. A retro VHS-themed portfolio with boot sequences, CRT effects, and tape reel animations.
vhs-portfolio.keyChallenge: Designed every interaction to feel like inserting a VHS tape. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and way too much CSS.
